select * from (select b.ID,b.STTP,b.LGTD,b.LTTD,b.STNM,b.STCD,isnull(p,0) as p,isnull(hourp,0) as hourp,isnull(c1.RAIN1,0) as RAIN1,isnull(c2.RAIN3,0) as RAIN3,isnull(c3.RAIN6,0) as RAIN6,isnull(c4.RAIN12,0) as RAIN12,isnull(c5.RAIN24,0) as RAIN24, (select case ad_lv when 5 then AD_NM when 6 then (select AD_NM from WRP_AD_B sub where sub.ad_cd=m.UP_ADCD)+'|'+AD_NM end from WRP_AD_B m where AD_CD=ADDVCD) as AD_NM , CV,CONVERT(varchar(16), r.TM, 120) as tm,a.FWL AS YUJING_FWL,a.FWL79 AS YUJING_FWL79,r.RZ,dbo.FUNC_GETAR(r.RZ,r.STCD) as AR,r.RWPTN,r.W,case when MONTH(r.TM) >=7 and MONTH(r.TM) <=9 then r.rz-a.FWL79 else r.RZ-a.FWL end as jxx, t.VOLMIN,t.VOLMAX,CONVERT(varchar(16), s.TM, 120) as gktm,vol ,case when vol <t.VOLMIN or vol >t.VOLMAX or cs=0 or cs is null then 0 else 1 end as _gkstatus ,case cs when 1 then '正常' else '异常' end as cs, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by p desc) AS RowId from (select * from ST_STBPRP_B) b left join (select stcd,sum(p) as p from ST_HP_C where DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111)) >='${Time_min}' and DATEADD(hh,TM,CONVERT(varchar(100), DT, 111))<='${Time_max}' group by stcd ) c on b.STCD=c.STCD left join(select stcd,p as hourp from ST_HP_C where DT=Substring(CONVERT(varchar,GETDATE(),120),1,10) and TM=DATEPART(HH,GETDATE())) hc on b.STCD=hc.STCD left join (select stcd,sum(DRP) as RAIN1 from ST_PPTN_R where TM>=DATEADD(hh,-1,GETDATE()) and TM <=GETDATE() group by stcd) c1 on b.STCD=c1.stcd left join (select stcd,sum(DRP) as RAIN3 from ST_PPTN_R where TM>=DATEADD(hh,-3,GETDATE()) and TM <=GETDATE() group by stcd) c2 on b.STCD=c2.stcd left join (select stcd,sum(DRP) as RAIN6 from ST_PPTN_R where TM>=DATEADD(hh,-6,GETDATE()) and TM <=GETDATE() group by stcd) c3 on b.STCD=c3.stcd left join (select stcd,sum(DRP) as RAIN12 from ST_PPTN_R where TM>=DATEADD(hh,-12,GETDATE()) and TM <=GETDATE() group by stcd) c4 on b.STCD=c4.stcd left join (select stcd,sum(DRP) as RAIN24 from ST_PPTN_R where TM>=DATEADD(hh,-24,GETDATE()) and TM <=GETDATE() group by stcd) c5 on b.STCD=c5.stcd left join ST_RSVR_R1 r on b.STCD=r.STCD left join ST_RSV_Alarm a on r.STCD=a.STCD left join ST_RSR_HYCH y on r.STCD=y.STCD inner join ST_StationStatus_R s on b.STCD=s.STCD left join ST_StationStatusType t on s.VOLTYPE=t.VOLTYPE
b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'
and
b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%'
and b.STGR in (${STGR})
and p >= #{P}
and y.RSVRTP in (${LEVEL})
and cs=1 and vol >=t.VOLMIN and vol <=t.VOLMAX
and (vol <t.VOLMIN or vol >t.VOLMAX)
and (cs=0 or cs is null)
and (cs=0 or cs is null or vol <t.VOLMIN or vol >t.VOLMAX)
) as b

select * from (select CV,b.ID,b.STCD,b.STTP,b.LTTD,b.LGTD,b.stnm ,CONVERT(varchar(16), TM, 120) as tm,a.FWL AS YUJING_FWL,a.FWL79 AS YUJING_FWL79,r.RZ,r.RWPTN,r.W,case when MONTH(TM) >=7 and MONTH(TM) <=9 then r.rz-a.FWL79 else r.RZ-a.FWL end as jxx , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order by tm desc) AS RowId from ST_STBPRP_B b inner join ST_STBPRP_F f on f.type=2 and b.stcd=f.stcd left join ST_RSVR_R1 r on b.STCD=r.STCD left join ST_RSV_Alarm a on r.STCD=a.STCD left join ST_RSR_HYCH y on r.STCD=y.STCD
b.stnm like '%'+#{STNM}+'%'
and b.addvcd like #{ADDVCD}+'%'
and b.stcd in(select stcd from ST_STINFO_WRP where FormID='WRP_IrrBTCanalSystem' and (BaseID = #{Canal_Code} or BaseID in(select Canal_Code from dbo.fn_getCanalChild(#{Canal_Code}))))
and b.STGR in (${STGR})
and r.RSVRTP = #{LEVEL}
) as b
select * from WRP_RSR_WLSTCPARRL where RSCD=(select BaseID From ST_STINFO_WRP Where STCD=#{STCD} AND FormID='WRP_RSR_WLSTCPARRL') order by WL
